title: Selected Writings
text:
Here are a few of my selected writings. Most notably, I wrote reader for the conference Dealing with Drugs in collaboration with leading field experts in drug policy and drug legalisation. Furthermore, I have written a few opinion pieces:

Dealing with Drugs Reader — “Exploring the past and the future of drug regulation”
https://www.amsterdam.nl/dealingwithdrugs/reader/
DUB (Utrecht University) — “Embracing AI in education: an urgent need for academia”
https://dub.uu.nl/en/opinion/embracing-ai-education-urgent-need-academia
Normaal Over Drugs — “Singapore is a classic example of failed drug policy”
https://normaaloverdrugs.nl/singapore-schoolvoorbeeld-van-mislukt-drugsbeleid/
Normaal Over Drugs — “The Dutch should be ashamed of their drug policy”
https://normaaloverdrugs.nl/drugsbeleid-om-je-voor-te-schamen/

title: Timo van Ommeren
text:
Hi — I’m Timo
I’m a Methodology & Statistics master’s student at Utrecht University.
This site is my portfolio: writing, and a detailed CV.
Currently: writing my thesis at the AI-aided knowledge lab.








NoteQuick links




GitHub: github.com/timovanommeren
Email: timovanommeren@gmail.com{timovanommeren@gmail.com}

title: Curriculum Vitae
text:
I’m a Methodology & Statistics master’s student at Utrecht University with a background in Psychological Methods (BSc, honours, cum laude).

text:
